name: Sci-Fi Driver
description:
A Sci-Fi Adventure game made in Unity.

Story

    An experiment in a Science Lab went wrong and the area was cleared. Some of the explosive crates were left behind. The Objective is to use a prototype car to deactivate all the crates in the Labs. 

    You need to clear all the checkpoints.

Complete the objective and reach the destination in minimum time.

Assets used from Unity Asset Store.

------------------------------------------------------------------

Unity Project Link

https://tinyurl.com/Sci-Fi-Driver

Please shrare your feedback and suggestions.
